quote: How do you measure the life of one person against the greater good? Can it ever be the right thing to sacrifice an innocent person? And how do you know what the greater good really is?
quote_letters: HOW DO YOU MEASURE THE LIFE OF ONE PERSON AGAINST THE GREATER GOOD CAN IT EVER BE THE RIGHT THING TO SACRIFICE AN INNOCENT PERSON AND HOW DO YOU KNOW WHAT THE GREATER GOOD REALLY IS
source: Amy Engel, The Book of Ivy
